title: NewMarket plans $100M expansion for specialty materials segment
excerpt: Discover NewMarket Corporation's Q1 2025 highlights: strong earnings, operational efficiency, AMPAC expansion, and strategic investments.
text: Earnings Call Insights: NewMarket Corporation (NEU) Q1 2025 Management View Net income for Q1 2025 was $126 million, or $13.26 per share, compared to $108 million, or $11.23 per share, for the same period in 2024. Sales of petroleum additives reached $646 million, with operating profit at $142 million. html:
Earnings Call Insights: NewMarket Corporation (NEU) Q1 2025

Management View

  • Net income for Q1 2025 was $126 million, or $13.26 per share, compared to $108 million, or $11.23 per share, for the same period in 2024. Sales of petroleum additives reached $646 million, with operating profit at $142 million.
